projects.title: Orgobucket
projects.description: This is A cross-platform app offers a unified interface for retailers and consumers, enabling easy fruit and vegetable purchasing. Customers can compare products, access nutritional information, and read reviews, while retailers can showcase their produce and manage inventory efficiently. It's a seamless solution for everyone involved.

projects.title: Qno
projects.description: This is A salon appointment booking app That simplifies the process of scheduling appointments with salons. Users can easily browse available services, select their preferred date and time, and book appointments with just a few taps. It's a convenient solution for both customers and salons to manage their schedules efficiently :)
